For anything related to your team members,
please come this way!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3202_0701_01_10:
Welcome!
Would you like to prepare for an adventure?
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3202_0701_02_10:

We hope to see you again!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3203_0701_01_10:
Welcome!
If you’d like to discuss your team members,
come right this way!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3203_0701_02_10:
Thank you!
Please stop by anytime!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_01_10:
I hope we get lots of
customers at the café.
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_02_10:
The role of a café is
to connect people.
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_03_10:
What kind of person will
stop by the café today?
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_05_10:
Oh my, that person’s
Pokémon is cute!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_06_10:
Let me take care of
your team!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_07_10:
If that person met that
person... Hee-hee!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3401_0701_01_10:
So I’ve got an interesting scoop!
You wanna hear?
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3402_0701_01_10:
That was some interesting news.
Oh, welcome!
I just got a nifty piece of information!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3501_1031_01_10:

of information!
